lead_paragraph: West Ham United are on the verge of bringing in two new players to bolster their Premier League campaign, manager Slaven Bilic said on Sunday after they officially opened their new stadium with a 3-2 friendly defeat by Juventus.

headline.print_headline: West Ham on Brink of Signing Two Players, Says Bilic
headline.main: West Ham on Brink of Signing Two Players, Says Bilic

snippet: West Ham United are on the verge of bringing in two new players to bolster their Premier League campaign, manager Slaven Bilic said on Sunday after they officially opened their new stadium with a 3-2 friendly defeat by Juventus....
